title: Hotel Paraiso Real in Mineral del Monte: Find Hotel Reviews, Rooms, and Prices on Hoteles.com
description: View deals for Hotel Paraiso Real, including fully refundable rates with free cancellation. Museo Casa Grande is minutes away. WiFi is free, and this hotel also features a restaurant and a bar. All rooms have Smart TVs and daily housekeeping.
